mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT m.id, m.parent_id AS parentId, m.menu_key AS menuKey, m.menu_name AS menuName, m.path AS path, m.icon AS icon, m.sort_no AS sortNo FROM user_role ur INNER JOIN role_menu rm ON rm.role_id = ur.role_id INNER JOIN menu m ON m.id = rm.menu_id WHERE ur.user_id = #{userId} AND m.enabled = 1 ORDER BY m.sort_no ASC, m.id ASC
